thread.title: Mrs Pav
thread.title_full: Great British Meat Co. reviewed by Mrs Pav

author: Mrs Pav
title: Mrs Pav
text: I ordered the special monthly offer in January. All the meat was incredibly tasty and it was well packaged. My only recommendation is to butcher the special offers meat as well. I received 2.5kg of pork shoulder which was very difficult for me to cut up and actually has put me off ordering again.
